entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:18 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 04:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: E 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Snow with ice pellets this afternoon and with freezing rain late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain this evening then to flurries overnight. Fog patches late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
